flawed_nl_solution:
Todd has $25 left after buying ingredients because 100 - 75 = <<100-75=25>>25
Todd made $150 selling snow-cones because 200 x 0.75 = <<200*0.75=150>>150
Todd has $715 before he pays his brother back because 25 + 150 = <<25+150=715>>715
After Todd pays his brother back he has $605 because 715 - 110 = <<715-110=605>>605
#### 605

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 175, not 715. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
